strapiPost.title: SoNA Takes Classical Music Beyond Classic Expectations
strapiPost.content:
The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas is getting tuned for another season of performances, both on main stages like the Walton Arts Center and the Walmart AMP as well as some unexpected stages throughout the community. 

  • Main stage performances: SoNA will take the main stage at Walton Arts Center for its first show of the season on Oct 29th.
  • SoNA Beyond: In an effort to show the community that symphony can go beyond traditional boundaries and serve all people, the SoNA Beyond series will take the orchestra across the community for performances at Fayetteville Public Library, Highlands Oncology, Crystal Bridges, Murphy Park, and other venues around the region.

See a full schedule of main stage and community performances HERE.
